3: It's getting late. I'll leave the rest of the work to you, is that alright?
Taking proper rests is important too! Not that I can help you with Gray Raven business, anyway.
You should be familiar with the process and preparations for connections as well. So go connect now!
Good evening—why are you connecting with me at this hour, Commandant?
I'm just sorting out the documents. Some new files got sent to us halfway through.
They're related to the base. You just have to verify them after I'm done, Commandant.

2: That should have been my job.
4: You can leave this to me.

3: The connection handbook doesn't recommend commandants working late at night, so please allow me to take care of these trivial matters for you.
Constructs don't need sleep, but you don't come with a frame like ours, Commandant.
And didn't I just tell you to go rest? Why are you still connecting with me at this hour, Commandant?
I decided to take on the paperwork so that you can improve your wellbeing. If you still insist on overworking yourself...
Then everything I did was in vain.
So, please disconnect now, Commandant. I'd have to sever the connection either way lest my efficiency drops.
